ygData.subject: Re:
ygData.msgSnippet: Journeyman s boots are dropped by Drez-something in Najena.  She is a level 24 mob but she is guarded by two necromancers and is generally considered a tough
ygData.messageBody:
Journeyman's boots are dropped by Drez-something in Najena. She is a
level 24 mob but she is guarded by two necromancers and is generally
considered a tough tough fight. I'd say two 29s could take her (at least
one good bolter in there) but it would be hard. A full party of 20s
should be able to take her as well, with possibly a casualty or two. Once
you get the room started it's much easier to hold. YOu have to wait about
4 hours to get boots usually.

- Christina

On Fri, 20 Aug 1999 scollier@... wrote:

> From: scollier@...
>
>
> Maybe. Ive not gone to Gukk too many times. I usually play a 16th level
> female warrior named Jadeeyes so going to Gukk may be a DEATH trap for me!
> ICK!
> I was curious...what level and name is the creature that has the
> journyman boots? Where are they? Thanks family!
>
> Sandy
